alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 8:17PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Prowers and eastern Kiowa Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 815 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 12 miles south of Towner, or 19 miles north of Coolidge, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, penny sized hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sheridan Lake and Towner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County
